Articles.Content: Hello everyone! I'm Nukas. I've been playing the game since Christmas and I love it! Ive just decided to make an account to be more active in the community. I haven't really done too much for progress. I've done a mun landing and almost got a rover to Duna but I came in too hot and it ripped apart when the parachute deployed. Hope in seeing all of you soon in the forums!

Welcome to the community Nukas

A Mun landing is a pretty good accomplishment, it shows you have managed to orbit, rendezvous with another planet and you can land

Good luck with the rover Mk2 to Duna, maybe try some drogue chutes as well

Thanks for all the replays! here are the photos of the rovers I tried sending.

Heres the rover I made that crashed. I found out why I had time warp on and the chute ripped off.

The second one is a mod rover I found. It flipped over and blew up.... After that I found out how to do quick saves.
a tip is to go into the docking mode, you will be able to steer the rover without any rotpower! =)
